sqlMap.select: SELECT p.id, p.name, teamId, t.name AS teamName, productLeaderId, u.name AS productLeaderName, p.createTime, p.modifyTime FROM product AS p LEFT JOIN user u ON p.productLeaderId = u.id, team t WHERE p.teamId = t.id
